name: Condiments Survival!
description:
Foods are coming and going to attack on you! Shoot them with your condiments!

Future

  • Survive for 5 minutes
  • 4 stages to play
  • 4 players to select
  • 6 abilities to select

Demo Version

You can play demo version here 

(When you play, click the blue text below the window to play it on full screen window.)
